name: Clash Rider - Clicker Tycoon
description:
Join the journey through the era!
Collect and pump the legendary vehicle. Dozens of epochs and characters of opponents of different factions are waiting for you! Go through the whole evolution people and the world through epochs starting with primitive man. Become the most legendary racer known to the whole world!
Drive crazy machines by clicking to speed up. Driving simulator of different vehicles. Racing in cars, motorcycles, flying ships, train, subway, horse riding and more.
ACCELERATE as fast as you can!

GAME FEATURES:
• Developed development system. Explore improvements.
• Click to make money, buy development and evolution.
• More than 100 rivals. Funny graphics and animation.
• A game about life in different eras and times of man.
• Clickers with upgrades.
• Various pets, create assistants: a cat, a bird, a pony, a dog and others.
• More than 20 eras, with a unique atmosphere!
• Over 100 cards with opponents and bosses!
• Fight the boss for victory!
• Daily rewards.
• Free boosts to help with the passage!
• Freegame Rider.
• Bleeding Clickers

How far are you ready to go into the future? Start the race now!
Leave us your comments, make the game even better together!
